full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 93 of 262 1798
LC8VMAX4 Hesse - cross
1 of '03.
2 Q. Okay. And I think you just testified that it was a part-time job at that point in time; correct?
3 A. That's correct.
4 Q. And I believe you had children and you were -- had other obligations as well; correct?
5 A. Yes, my two-year old came with me.
6 Q. Right. And so the practice was for you to -- when Mr. Epstein wasn't in residence, you would go to the Palm Beach house and take care of various maintenance issues, monitor what was going on, those types of things; correct?
7 A. That's correct.
8 Q. And when Mr. Epstein was in residence, your services were not needed there; correct?
9 A. That's correct.
10 Q. So I think it would be fair to say you functioned as what I would call sort of a part-time caretaker of the property?
11 A. Manager, yeah.
12 Q. And you would go for however much time was needed, and then you would leave and go back home, right?
13 A. That's correct.
14 Q. Okay. Now, when you were doing this job, sometimes Ms. Maxwell would be there and sometimes Ms. Maxwell wouldn't be there; correct?
15 A. That's correct.
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018955
